attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: Kept crashing my phone. dumb af.

attributes.title: Dump Trump !
attributes.review: This app was not working for me. I think this app should be banned in all seven continents ! (even though this app caters to Americans🥰)

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support our wonderful orange president🍊. moments after my phone started to crash i got text messages saying “trump 2020” i got weird writings on my wall saying “trump 2020” my phone is starting to turn orange.

attributes.title: Dear mr Trump
attributes.review: I was really intrigued to download this app only to be disappointed I genuinely have no words this app is just not too tier it’s ugly

attributes.title: Don’t vote for trump
attributes.review: This is the wise app in the world do not get it you will regret it with all your hart plz plz do not get this app!!!!!!!!
When I opened the app I saw something disgusting🤮🤧

attributes.title: disappointing :(
attributes.review: The app just felt like it needed more color

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: this app has so many glitches and bugs. i downloaded it and right away it was saying trump 2020 and that is wrong. there must be a glitch in the system to state wrong accusations. also it is supporting racism, homophobia, and abolishing womans rights. this is disgusting🤬

attributes.title: To slow
attributes.review: This app was so slow it wouldn’t load at all:(

attributes.title: The worst!!!!
attributes.review:
This app is a hyuuuuuuuge fail!!! Operates like a nightmare, crashes like Trump’s marriages and his approval rating, and is overall very bad.

Worst app ever!
